object_attributes.title: Infrastructure Onboarding
object_attributes.content:
For general Onboarding to CAD go to the
[Operations wiki](https://gitlab.com/digitalautonomy/operations/Onboarding/wikis/Home).

---

This document shows how to have a smooth start with infrastructure related
stuff. If you find something missing or some section that could get improved,
please contribute by editing this wiki.

---

[[_TOC_]]

### Gitlab
We use our own Gitlab instance to track our work, and host many repositories as well. You are probably reading this text on the wiki in the Gitlab instace. It's hosted at [gitlab.autonomia.digital](https://gitlab.autonomia.digital).

The [infrastructure Management project](https://gitlab.autonomia.digital/infrastructure/Management)
in there hosts a [this wiki](https://gitlab.autonomia.digital/infrastructure/Management/wikis)
and the [infrastructure issue tracker](https://gitlab.autonomia.digital/infrastructure/Management/issues)
that can be displayed as a [kanban board](https://gitlab.autonomia.digital/infrastructure/Management/boards).

### Dashboard

(TODO: this currently is not deployed anywhere and needs revising)

We have a [CAD Dashboard](https://dashboard.autonomia.digital/dashboard),
see the wiki [Dashboard](infrastructure/Dashboard) page for more details.

## For the infrastructure team

- [ ] Mail account
- [ ] [XMPP account](infrastructure/prosody#createmodify-user)
- [ ] Get github account and add to the CAD organization, and potentially OTRv4 and Coyim
- [ ] Create gitlab account and add to the proper places
- [ ] Add shell account via ansible
- [ ] Add GPG key to pass keyring, re-encrypt all passwords to everyone
- [ ] Point to the [onboarding wiki page](onboarding)
- [ ] Add to Signal group
